body:
Hello everyone,



I have been going the energy simulation tutorials and I have to say thank you for all the resources you are giving.



I have a quick question on visualizing results. Is there an option to somehow animate the changes during a whole day, for example of cooling loads or operative temperatures, when visualizing results per zones? Something like a movable step of simulation slider.



I think it would help both in communicating results as in actually interpreting them.



Thank you in advance.



Kind regards,

Theodore.
topic: Creating video files out of eplus visualizations
